property.name: Keywords
property.value: Players cannot play attachments on The Witch-king.

property.name: Text
property.value:
While The Witch-king is in the staging area, each character gets -1 Ò.
Forced: After The Witch-king attacks, he returns to the staging area unless the defending player raises his threat by 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, all copies of Snaga Scouts engage the player with the lowest threat. (The first player chooses in case of a tie.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Wolves from Mordor attack and destroy a character, shuffle Wolves from Mordor into the encounter deck.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Deal 2 damage to the defending character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each damage dealt by Wainriders raises the defending player's threat by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Move the top Scout enemy from the encounter discard pile to the staging area. (Top 2 Scout enemies instead if the players have crossed the Anduin.)

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, attacking enemy gets +2 Û if it is a Scout.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the players have crossed the Anduin, Uruk Vanguard gets +3 Û.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if players have crossed the Anduin).

property.name: Text
property.value: If the players have crossed the Anduin, Captured Watchtower gets +3 $.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Remove all defending characters from combat. This attack is considered undefended.

property.name: Text
property.value: The first Scout enemy revealed from the encounter deck each round gains surge and doomed 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Morgulduin is the active Location, it gains: 'Forced: When a character commits to a Quest, deal 1 damage to that character.'

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If the players have not yet crossed the Anduin, return any current active location to the staging area. Morgulduin becomes the active location.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the players have crossed the Anduin, Pelennor Fields gains: 'When faced with the option to travel, the players must either travel to Pelennor Fields or raise each player's threat by 3.'

property.name: Text
property.value: If the players have crossed the Anduin, Ruins of Osgiliath gets +3 $.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must discard all ally cards from his hand, if able.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending player must discard 1 ally card from his hand or attacking enemy gets +3 Û. (2 allies instead if this attack is undefended.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Raise the total $ of the staging area by 1 for each Scout enemy in play. If there are no Scout enemies in play, Dark Pursuit gains surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, each card revealed by the encounter deck gains doomed 1. (Doomed 3 instead if the players have crossed the Anduin.)

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player takes control of Ranger of Ithilien, exhausted and committed to the quest. Then, Ranger of Ithilien gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Deal 2 damage to attacking enemy. The defending player may exhaust a character he controls to take control of Ranger of Ithilien.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Search the encounter deck for 12 Scout cards, and add 3 per player (one of each title), to the staging area. Remove The Witch-king from the encounter deck and set him aside, out of play. Shuffle any unused Scoutcards back into the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players cannot travel to West Bank locations.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Players cannot travel to West Bank locations.
Each player cannot play or put into play more than 1 card from his hand each round.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Progress tokens from card effects cannot be placed on this quest card or the active location.
Players cannot travel to East Bank or West Bank locations.
In order to commit characters to the Quest, a player must first choose a hero or 1 Ranger of Ithilien card he controls. Discard each chosen card from play.

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Revealed: Add The Witch-king to the staging area. Players have now crossed the Anduin. Players cannot travel to East Bank locations.
If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.
